name: Giorgos Vidales
story: Janos Petridis is a veteran soldier with over 15 years of service in the military. He has been deployed to various conflict zones around the world and has seen his fair share of combat. His experience and leadership have earned him respect among his peers and superiors. Janos is a devout Orthodox Christian and is married with three children. He takes great pride in his family and works hard to ensure their safety and well-being. While he can come off as strict and stern at times, he has a deep sense of compassion and loyalty towards those under his command.
